alert.note: Alert for Franklin; St. Charles; Warren (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Saint Louis (Eastern Missouri and West Central Illinois)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 01 at 11:31PM CDT until July 02 at 12:00AM CDT by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: The National Weather Service in St Louis has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern St. Charles County in east central Missouri... Central Franklin County in east central Missouri... Southeastern Warren County in east central Missouri... * Until midnight CDT. * At 1131 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near New Haven, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Washington, Union, Pacific, New Haven, Gray Summit, Villa Ridge, Marthasville, Augusta, Beaufort, Treloar, Dutzow, Defiance, Leslie, Matson, Lyon, Robertsville, and Catawissa. This includes Interstate 44 in Missouri between exits 247 and 257. This also includes Robertsville State Park. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
